name: Devoured Or Transformed By The Wolf
name_original: Devoured Or Transformed By The Wolf
description:
You meet a nice wolf at the bar.  But going home with him results in some strange encounters. . .

An 4000 word interactive for Pilar05.

Want a game like this one? Contact me on FA (https://www.furaffinity.net/user/tastyace/), on Twitter (https://twitter.com/ace_tasty), or on Discord at TastyAce#6678.
